dmca.title: NetResult DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
NetResult Internal Reference:  ASO_NRID177723

Please quote the above ASO_NRID177723 reference in all communications with us regarding this issue.

Audio Visual Infringement

Dear Sirs,

We write on behalf of Amaury Sports Organisation (ASO) who own and control all rights associated with the conduct, promotion and management of the Tour de France, including but not limited to, all related intellectual property, broadcast and footage rights worldwide.  We have been authorised by ASO to send this letter to you on their behalf.  

We have noticed that your website, http://sonic111.blogspot.com/ is displaying, promoting and/or offering audio, visual and/or audio-visual content from the 2011 Tour de France. All copyright in such images are vested in ASO.

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from ASO to use this content your present use is a clear infringement of the ASO's rights and patently infringes the copyright held in that content. Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of the web sites you own and/or control and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or implied waiver of any of ASO's rights or remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which are expressly reserved.

Formal Declaration

I hereby state that Amaury Sports Organisation owns and controls the exclusive rights to the audio, visual and/or audio-visual content referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to act on behalf of ASO with respect to internet monitoring and compliance related to infringement of such rights.

I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of such A/V content in the manner complained of is not authorised by ASO, its agents, or the law.


[I, [redacted] , as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.]

Please note that nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or implied waiver of any of The FFT's rights or remedies, all of which are expressly reserved.

We thank you for your cooperation.
 
Yours faithfully,
 
[redacted]

NetResult Solutions Limited
PO BOX 68506
London
SW15 9DT
United Kingdom
+44 (0)20 8246 4123



-----------------------------------------------------------------

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please 
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail 
immediately to the correct person or department for action.

This email and any attachments thereto may contain private, 
confidential, and privileged material for the sole use of the individual 
or entity to whom they are addressed. If you are not the intended 
recipient, be advised that you have received this email in error and 
that any use, dissemination, forwarding, printing or copying of this 
email is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in 
error, please immediately return this by e-mail and then delete it.

Although this email message has been scanned for the presence of 
computer viruses, the sender accepts no liability for any damage 
sustained as a result of a computer virus and it is the recipient's 
responsibility to ensure that this email is virus free.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
